Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation that would give New York City, and any public authorities or public benefit corporations operating therein, broad authority to utilize the design-build delivery method for capital projects
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Public authorities or public benefit corporations operating therein, broad authority to utilize the design-build delivery method for capital projects.
